price: Jika Allah menghendaki, niscaya Dia musnahkan kamu, wahai manusia, dan Dia datangkan umat yang lain (sebagai penggantimu).  Dan adalah Allah Maha Kuasa berbuat demikian.
arabic: إِن يَشَأۡ يُذۡهِبۡكُمۡ أَيُّهَا ٱلنَّاسُ وَيَأۡتِ بِـَٔاخَرِينَۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ ذَٰلِكَ قَدِيرٗا

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: in yasha yudh'hib'kum ayyuhā al-nāsu wayati biākharīna wakāna al-lahu ʿalā dhālika qadīran
